department.dept_long_name: Department of Earth and Planetary Sciences

course.title: The Missing Matlab Course: An Introduction to Programming and Data Analysis
course.meeting_text: W., F., 2-5. Course time includes lecture and lab.
course.description: An overview of modern computational tools with applications to the Earth Sciences. Introduction to the MATLAB programming and visualization environment. Topics include: statistical and time series analysis, visualization of two- and three-dimensional data sets, tools for solving linear/differential equations, parameter estimation methods. Labs emphasize applications of the methods and tools to a wide range of data in Earth Sciences.
